findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as public and lacks access control, allowing anyone to call it.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom Function
findings.description: The transferFrom function is publicly accessible and can be exploited by unauthorized users.

findings.title: permit
findings.description: The permit function has been marked with a red flag, indicating potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected mint Function
findings.description: The mint function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Unprotected Swap Function
findings.description: The swap function is declared as external and lacks access control, allowing unauthorized users to interact with it.

findings.title: sync() Function
findings.description: The sync() function has been identified as a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected and can be called multiple times, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens has a potential vulnerability related to fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens is vulnerable to fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability due to supporting fee on transfer tokens in swapExactETHForTokens function.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: The function swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens may be vulnerable to fee-on-transfer tokens.
